Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to opportunities for veteran-owned business enterprises in city procurement.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Opportunities for veteran-owned business enterprises in city procurement.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, A.2554, legislation which would require at least three percent of the total value of annual state procurements are awarded to veteran-owned businesses.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require at least three percent of the total value of annual state procurements are awarded to veteran-owned businesses. (A.2554)

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Small Business

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Reyna, James, Koo and King
